title: SING to the Lord, our Might

verses.text:
SING to the Lord, our Might,â€”
With holy fervor sing;
Let hearts and instruments unite
To praise our heavenly King.

As unto them of old,
Who roamed this wilderness,
Our God is still above his fold,
To pity and to bless.

Then let us open wide
Our hearts for that to shine;
And he who Israel's steps did guide
Will help his people shine.
